attributes.value: Sees guile and cunning as indirect and somewhat worthless
Sees those that attempt to maintain dignified and proper behavior as vain and offensive
Believes it is important to conceal emotions and refrain from complaining
Values good craftsmanship
Sees working hard as a foolish waste of time
Holds the view that commerce is a vile obscenity
Is often cheerful
Feels strong urges and seeks short-term rewards
Is very impolite and inconsiderate of propriety
Is pleased by her own appearance and talents
Presents herself modestly and frowns on any flashy accoutrements
Has no sense of vengeance or retribution
Has an overinflated sense of self-worth
Generally finds herself quite hopeful about the future
Tends to consider what others think of her
Is not a private person and freely shares details of her life
Is inattentive to detail in her own work
Is sloppy with her living space
Quick to heal
Meager creativity
Bad intuition
A shortage of patience
A good feel for social relationships
